name: Cleveritics for WordPress
author: Vladimir Prelovac

sections.description:
WordPress plugin for easy integration of real-time web analytics from Cleveritics.com

License

sections.installation:
1. Upload the whole plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
  3. Use the Options page to insert your Cleveritics tracking ID
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Fixed problems with IE

1.2

  • Improvements in tracking code

1.0

  • Initial version
